drugName: Cetaphil Moisturizer/Cetaphil DailyAdvance Ultra Hydrating Lotion

activeIngredients: Cetaphil Moisturizing Cream Propylene glycol, petrolatum, dicapryl ether, PEG 5, glyceryl stearate, glycerin, dimethicone, dimethiconol, sweet almond oil, cetyl alcohol, benzyl alcohol, acrylates crosspolymer, tocopheryl acetate. Cetaphil DailyAdvance Ultra Hydrating Lotion Butyrospermum parkii (shea butter), panthenol, Na PCA, cyclopentasiloxane, dimethiconol, Na polyacrylate, glycerin, hydrogenated polyisobutene, cetearyl alcohol, ceteareth-20, macadamia nut oil, tocopheryl acetate, stearoxytrimethylsilane, stearyl alcohol, acrylates (C10-C30), alkyl acrylate crosspolymer
details.atc: D02AX - Other emollients and protectives ; Used as skin emollients and protectants.

activeIngredients: Per Mecola caplet α-lipoic acid (ALA) 300 mg, cyanocobalamin 100 mcg. Mecola Forte α-lipoic acid
Maxpofer Lipofer 375 mg (equiv to elemental Fe 30 mg), Mn 10 mg, Cu 10 mg, folic acid 500 mcg, vit B12 7.5 mcg, Se 50 mcg. Maxpofer Jr/Maxpofer Baby Lipofer equiv to elemental Fe 15 mg
details.atc: B03A - IRON PREPARATIONS ; Used in the treatment of anemia

activeIngredients: Per Osteor cap Glucosamine sulphate 500 mg, chondroitin sulphate 400 mg, vit C 50 mg, manganese 0.5 mg, Mg 10 mg, Zn 5 mg, selenium 10 mcg. Per Osteor Plus caplet Glucosamine sulphate 500 mg, chondroitin sulfate 400 mg, vit C 50 mg, manganese 0.5 mg, Mg 10 mg, selenium 10 mcg, Zn 5 mg, MSM 350 mg. Per Osteor Plus effervescent tab Glucosamine K sulfate 750 mg, chondroitin sulfate 600 mg, vit C 50 mg, manganese 0.5 mg, Mg 10 mg, Zn 5 mg, selenium 10 mcg, MSM 350 mg
